mapper.update: UPDATE IDEAS SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, confirm = #{confirm} like_count = #{likeCount},
mapper.select: SELECT idx_num,user_id,subject,content,confirm,REGdate,like_count FROM IDEAS ORDER BY idx_num
SELECT idx_num,user_id,subject,content,confirm,REGdate,like_count FROM IDEAS WHERE idx_num>=#{startIndex} AND idx_num<=#{endIndex} ORDER BY idx_num

SELECT a.rn, a.id, a.sub, a.con, a.reg FROM ( SELECT a.rn, a.id, a.sub, a.con, a.reg FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, USER_ID id, TITLE sub, CONTENT con , REGDATE reg FROM IDEA_BOARD) a WHERE rn <= 15 * #{page}) a WHERE rn > 15 * (#{page} - 1)
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM IDEA_BOARD ORDER BY HITCNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=3
